description.@en: During certain seasons, your Magick grows immensely in power – particularly when you attempt to draw deeper from the wellspring of Elementalism. You can more accurately guess how the Winds of the Æther will impact your ability to cast, as you withdraw a power untold among other Magickal orders.

effect.@en: Whenever you enter this Expert Profession, select two seasons of the campaign world. During the first season, subtract one Chaos Die when you Channel Power. During the other season, subtract two Chaos Dice when you Channel Power.
